com.SIMRacingApps

Class Windows

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.SIMRacingApps.Windows

  • public class Windows
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines wrappers to all of the calls to the Windows API. This way, all the platform specific stuff is all in one place. All methods are static, so there is no need to instantiate this class as an object.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jeffrey Gilliam
    Copyright:
    Copyright (C) 2015 - 2023 Jeffrey Gilliam
    License:
    Apache License 2.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Windows.Handle
      Defines a wrapper for a HANDLE to hide the Windows definition details
      static class  Windows.MsgId
      Defines a wrapper for the MsgId to hide Windows definition details.
      static class  Windows.Pointer
      Defines a wrapper for a Pointer to hide the JNA definition details
      static class  Windows.Robot
      The Windows.Robot class is a subclass of the java.awt.Robot class.

        public static int getLastError()

        Returns:

        Returns the text error message associated with the last error number.
        Returns:

        public static Windows.Pointer mapViewOfFile(Windows.Handle h)
        Returns a Pointer to the memory where the file was mapped to.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        A Pointer to the memory.

      • openCommPort

        public static Windows.Handle openCommPort(int portNumber)
        Return a Handle to a COM port There is some good information here about how to use the Window serial port API.
        Parameters:
        portNumber - The port number to open as an integer
        Returns:
        A Handle object to the open port, null if error.

      • openEvent

        public static Windows.Handle openEvent(java.lang.String eventName)
        Returns a Handle to an Event.
        Parameters:
        eventName - The name of the event.
        Returns:
        A Handle for the event.

      • openFileMapping

        public static Windows.Handle openFileMapping(java.lang.String filename)
        Returns a Handle to a memory mapped file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The memory map name.
        Returns:
        A Handle to the file.

      • postMessage

        public static void postMessage(com.sun.jna.platform.win32.WinDef.HWND hWin,
                               Windows.MsgId id,
                               int wParam,
                               int lParam)
        Sends a message to the specified window and does not wait on it to be received
        Parameters:
        hWin - A handle to an existing window.
        id - The MsgId to send to.
        wParam - A 32 bit word.
        lParam - A 64 bit word.

      • registerWindowMessage

        public static Windows.MsgId registerWindowMessage(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the MsgId of named message.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the message
        Returns:
        The MsgId or null on failure

      • sendNotifyMessage

        public static void sendNotifyMessage(Windows.MsgId id,
                                     int wParam,
                                     int lParam)
        Sends a message to anyone listening to the specified MsgId
        Parameters:
        id - The MsgId to send to.
        wParam - A 32 bit word.
        lParam - A 64 bit word.

      • setCommPortRTS

        public static boolean setCommPortRTS(Windows.Handle hCommPort,
                                     boolean flag)
        This method either sets or clears the RTS signal on the comm port.
        Parameters:
        hCommPort - A handle to an open comm port
        flag - true sets RTS, false clears RTS
        Returns:
        true if successful

      • setCommPortDTR

        public static boolean setCommPortDTR(Windows.Handle hCommPort,
                                     boolean flag)
        This method either sets or clears the DTR signal on the comm port.
        Parameters:
        hCommPort - A handle to an open comm port
        flag - true sets DTR, false clears DTR
        Returns:
        true if successful

      • setConsoleTitle

        public static void setConsoleTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Sets the title of the console window.
        Parameters:
        title - The title.

      • setForegroundWindow

        public static boolean setForegroundWindow(java.lang.String windowClass,
                                          java.lang.String windowTitle)
        Finds the window with the given title and brings it to the foreground. If no window exists, then nothing changes.
        Parameters:
        windowClass - The window class or null
        windowTitle - The window title or null
        Returns:
        true if success, false if not.

      • unmapViewOfFile

        public static void unmapViewOfFile(Windows.Pointer p)
        Removes the memory pointer mapping.
        Parameters:
        p - The Pointer to release.

      • waitForSingleObject

        public static void waitForSingleObject(Windows.Handle h,
                                       int timeout)
        Waits for a specified amount of time for an event to occur.
        Parameters:
        h - A Handle to an event.
        timeout - Amount of time to wait in milliseconds.

      • setAffinity

        public static void setAffinity(int cores_to_reserve)
        Tells windows what cores I'm allowed to run on.
        Parameters:
        cores_to_reserve - The number of cores to reserve.
